mapper.select: select p.pno, p.pname, p.price, p.status, concat(pi.uuid,'_',pi.fileName) fileName from tbl_product p left outer join tbl_product_image pi on pi.pno = p.pno where pi.ord = 0 or pi.ord is null order by p.pno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_product (pname,price,status) values (#{pname}, #{price}, #{status})
